references.paper_title: Renderdiffusion: Image diffusion for 3d reconstruction, inpainting and generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to 3D generation using image diffusion, which is directly relevant to the methods explored in the current paper.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3D Gaussian splatting technique, which is used as the core 3D representation in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the latent diffusion model, which serves as the foundation for many of the image diffusion models used in the current paper.
This paper introduces the denoising diffusion probabilistic model, a fundamental concept underlying many of the methods used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Point-e: A system for generating 3d point clouds from complex prompts
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for generating 3D point clouds from text prompts, providing another relevant approach in the field of 3D generation.
